participant_1.name: Alice Johnson
participant_1.personality: Alice is nurturing and empathetic, often finding joy in nature and literature. She enjoys sharing knowledge about history and art.
participant_1.background: i am partly deaf. i'm a museum tour guide. i grow roses in my garden. i have a big library at home.

participant_2.name: Marcus Lee
participant_2.personality: Marcus is creative and energetic, with a passion for music and a laid-back attitude. He thrives in vibrant environments.
participant_2.background: i listen to rap music. i drive a 2015 honda civic. my favourite food is pizza. i produce music for artists.

content.text: i tend my rose garden and read books   i am deaf in one ear
